resources.string: Suppose we want the ID3 algorithm to decide whether the weather is amenable to playing baseball. Over the course of 2 weeks, data is collected to help ID3 build a decision tree .

We need to find which attribute will be the root node in our decision tree. The gain is calculated for all four attributes: 
 Gain(S, Outlook) = 0.246
 Gain(S, Temperature) = 0.029
 Gain(S, Humidity) = 0.151
 Gain(S, Wind) = 0.048
